settings.about_head_text: My name is Ariella. I'm an herbalist, formulator, and feminine care advocate.
settings.about_head_text2: I am the founder ofÂ  the Love Your Feminine Co.
settings.about_pera_text: where we are redefining feminine care and re-establishing feminine health worthiness.
settings.about_cust_pera_text: At The Love Your Feminine Co.
settings.about_cust_pera_text2: , we are seriously passionate about helping women understand their body, and claiming their feminine health - breasts, vulva, vaginal.
settings.about_text2: is 100% woman owned. All Products are formulated  and made by a woman for women.

settings.about_head_text_second: is to create products that support  all women in their journey  to claim and achieve a healthy feminine body for life.
settings.about_second_cust_pera_text: Our foundational truth is that our feminine body was designed to sustain its health for life with proactive, interactive and intentional care.
settings.about_second_cust_pera_text2: They are worthy of daily care and preservation.

settings.third_about_pera_text: Small-Batch made for potency and freshness
All herbs used are Organic and ethically wild crafted, sourced globally.
Each herbal ingredient was intentionally chosen for its ability to support your breast  wellness by encouraging the process of healthy blood, lymphatic flow and detoxification.
They are a strong foundation on which to build a healthy breast care lifestyle.

settings.about_third_text: I am proud to have developed and be able to offer to you the first full line of daily breast care products that support a more empowered, proactive healthy breast lifestyle model.
settings.about_third_text2: Our products were formulated to be your healthy breast allies - and to assist you in achieving life-long elevated breast health and well-being.
settings.about_third_text3: OUR PRODUCTS ARE MADE WITH LOVE, PASSION AND PURPOSE IN DENVER, COLORADO

settings.about_head_text_last: WE'RE STARTING A HEALTHY BREAST CARE REVOLUTION
settings.about_last_text: Innovative Products + Better Body Literacy + Educational Resources
settings.about_last_text2: Empower yourself with the tools, practices and knowledge that will help you sustain and maintain your breast health for life.
